long_description: Hitting the sweet spot between performance and comfort, the streamlined Gregory Z40 Pack helps you slim down your load for light and fast trips. CrossFlo(TM) DTS suspension provides cooling airflow across your back and efficiently transfers load weight to your hips. Auto-Fit harness increases the stiffness of the frame as the load in the pack increases, helping ensure that the pack body maintains its shape. 3 points of access make it easy to load and unload your gear, food and sleeping bag. Hydration-compatible design features reservoir pocket and dual drink-tube exit ports for on-the-go hydration (reservoir not included). Top lid features a zippered pocket for small items and a second compartment on the underside to secure personal items. The Gregory Z40 Pack is constructed from 210-denier HT double diamond ripstop and 330-denier nylon oxford flatweave fabric for tear strength and abrasion resistance. Removable raincover; hipbelt pockets; zippered front pocket; mesh side pockets; side compression straps. Closeout.
short_description: Hitting the sweet spot between performance and comfort, the streamlined Gregory Z40 Pack helps you slim down your load for light and fast trips.
